name: Hellraid
overview: [sic] In a wild and enchanted world, in the Tibis village at the foot of the volcano Titus, happened and unforeseen event. The giant of lava that had been lived for Centuries into the depths of the volcano, suddenly awakened, threatening Tibis and the surrounding villages. The frequent earthquake shocks and the continual eruptions were a serious danger for the population that fell prey to despair and asked the warrior Athor to get into the bowels of the earth for defeating the giant. An amazing and immense game with more than 160 screens and 200 animated sprites for and endless amusement!!!
